if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552)) {
                    if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) // this is the time delay
                    {

                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("H3llToy")) {
                            npcs[i].textUpdate = "H3llToy is ONLINE";
                        } else {
                            npcs[i].textUpdate = "H3llToy is OFFLINE";
                        }
